childrenComponentProp.name: data
childrenComponentProp.docblock:
This is the data that will generate the navigation
Data is made up an array of objects
Read Notes tab to see the structure of the data prop

childrenComponentProp.name: updateCurrentSection
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Function to update currentSection in state

childrenComponentProp.name: toggleDropDown
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Function to update currentDropdown in state

childrenComponentProp.name: toggleDisplayHidden
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Function to update if the MegaMenu is displayed or not

childrenComponentProp.name: currentSection
childrenComponentProp.docblock: String value of current dropdown section

childrenComponentProp.name: linkClicked
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Optional function to intercept links clicked

childrenComponentProp.name: columnThreeLinkClicked
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Optional function to intercept links clicked at column three
